explains: n. 不可预测性，不可预知性；不可预见性

sentences.en: There is also the same exuberance and unpredictability in sudden fad switches.
sentences.cn: 时尚的突然转变也具有同样的活力和不可预测性。

sentences.en: Traffic jam leads to expense and unpredictability, things that keep investors away.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞会导致费用和不可预测性，这让投资者望而却步。

sentences.en: The unpredictability of the real world may bring to the surface a troubling software problem.
sentences.cn: 现实世界的不可预测性可能会带来一个麻烦的软件方面的问题。
